enterIbanToLinkBank: Enter your IBAN to link your bank securely
ibanDescription: Your IBAN (International Bank Account Number) uniquely identifies your account.
ibanLocation: You can find it on your bank statement or in your online banking portal. If you need help locating it, please contact your bank.
confirmAgreementToTerms: Confirm your agreement to our service terms.
iConfirmAccurateInfo: I confirm that all submitted information is accurate.
verificationPendingMessage: Our Team is currently reviewing your application and will notify you once your account is ready!
personalizeProfileByGender:
Help us personalize your profile by

uploadDocumentsSubtitle:
Please upload the necessary documents
to proceed.
uploadBothSidesMessage:
For national ID and residency. Please upload
images of both front and back sides.
documentsWarningMessage: All documents must be clear and valid. Your profile won't be activated without verification.
fileSizeError: File size must be less than 5MB
profileSetupSubtitle:
Set up your profile in seconds and start
receiving tips instantly.
enterBankDetailsToUpdate: Enter bank details to update your account
transferScheduleDescription: TipMe will transfer your available funds every Monday directly to your linked bank account.

thankYouReportingIssue: Thank you for reporting the issue! Our team will review it and get back to you soon.

keepAccountSafe: Keep your account safe and secure
areYouSureSignOut: Are you sure you want to sign out?

reachOutForHelp: Reach out for help or questions.
letUsKnowIssues: Let us know about any issues.
findQuickAnswers: Find quick answers to common questions.
readTheRules: Read the rules for using our service.
seeHowWeHandleData: See how we handle your data.
forQuickHelpCall: For quick help, give us a call.
whatsAppSupportMessage: Hello, I need support with TipMe app.
welcomeToTipMeTerms&Condition: Welcome to TipMe! By using our platform to receive or manage tips, you agree to our terms and conditions. Please review them carefully before proceeding.
useOfServiceDesc: You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You are responsible for any activity that occurs under your account.
accountRegistrationDesc: To access certain features, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for keeping your login information secure and notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use.
intellectualPropertyDesc: All content, including logos, images, text, and software, is owned by [Your Company Name] and protected by copyright and other laws.
prohibitedActivitiesDesc: You may not use the service for any unlawful purpose or in a way that could harm, disable, or interfere with the site or its users.
terminationDesc: We may suspend or terminate your access to the service at any time for violations of these terms.
changesToTermsDesc: We may update these terms from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the updated date.
contactUsDesc: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at support@tipme.com.
privacyIntro: At TipMe, your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
informationWeCollectDesc: We collect personal information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment information when you use our services.
howWeUseInfoDesc: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, communicate with you, and ensure the security of our platform.
dataSharingDesc: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our platform, conducting our business, or servicing you.
dataSecurityDesc: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
yourRightsDesc: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also object to or restrict certain processing of your data.
cookiesDesc: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information to enhance your user experience.
contactUsPrivacyDesc: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact us at privacy@tipme.com.
mobileNumberChangedSuccessfully: Your mobile number has been changed successfully.
otpVerifiedSuccessfully: Your OTP has been verified successfully.
confirmSignOut: Are you sure you want to sign out?
signOutFailed: Failed to sign out. Please try again.
errorOccurred: An error occurred. Please try again.
lastResendAttemptUsed: This was your last resend attempt. No more codes can be sent.
codeResentSuccessfully: Code sent successfully. Remaining resend attempts: {attempts}
failedToResendCode: Failed to resend code. Please try again.
